comments:
I get an NPE when I try to open an aspect file with AspectJ/Java Editor, but only when it resides in the source folder of a Web project created from WST 1.0. The editor opens the file correctly when it's under a regular Java project. Using WST 1.0, Eclipse 3.1.1.

Sorry. I had a build path problem that was affecting the way this opened and, for whatever reason, I didn't notice it. The .aj files open now, but my guess is you still don't want the AJ editor to choke when there is a build path problem, so I'm bringing the level down to Minor.

Does this bug still occur with more recent versions of WST, Eclipse, and AJDT?
If so, are you able to attach a simple web project with the required build path problem to cause this?
